definition: fleabane (family Asteraceae)/disheveled/classifier for luxuriant plants, smoke, ashes, campfires: clump, puff
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary

sentences.english: Dozens of bees circled his tousled brown curls in an angle's halo.
sentences.chinese: 一羣蜜蜂繞着他那蓬亂的棕色捲髮，好像天使的光環。

sentences.english: His beard straggles because he hasn't shaven for a week.
sentences.chinese: 他的鬍鬚蓬亂，他有一個星期沒刮鬍子了。

sentences.english: His 3)scraggly blonde beard kept more than his face warm.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓬亂的金色鬍鬚讓他整個人透出幾分暖意。

sentences.english: That is the tousle-haired island baker collectinghis flour.
sentences.chinese: 那個頭髮蓬亂的島上面包師傅正在點收他的麪粉。

sentences.english: She stands in the ruins, hair loose and paralyzed, awaiting her punishment.
sentences.chinese: 她站在廢墟里，頭髮鬆散蓬亂，等待着對她的懲罰。

sentences.english: The colour of her dishevelled white hair seemed especially glaring in the dark room.
sentences.chinese: 他看見母親的蓬亂的白髮在昏暗的室內顯得分外刺眼。

sentences.english: His head was crowned with a mop of brown curls.
sentences.chinese: 他長了一頭蓬亂的棕色鬈髮。

sentences.english: She had short, unruly hair and wide-set eyes that glared at the camera in a closeup shot.
sentences.chinese: 她蓬亂的頭髮剪得很短，睜大眼睛看着近距離的鏡頭。

sentences.english: That is the tousle-haired island baker collecting his flour.
sentences.chinese: 那個頭髮蓬亂的島上面包師傅正在點收他的麪粉。

sentences.english: I have unkempt hair,I have to comb it.
sentences.chinese: 我的頭髮蓬亂，我要梳理一下。

sentences.english: There were some scraggly bushes, but that was all.
sentences.chinese: 那裏只有有蓬亂的灌木。

sentences.english: He sat on the edge of his cot , running his fingers through his wild hair.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在牀沿上，用手指理了理蓬亂的頭髮。

sentences.english: There were some scraggly bushes, but that was all.
sentences.chinese: 哪裏只有有蓬亂的灌木。

sentences.english: Cuiping's hair was a mess, her face was bruised, but she had been given new clothes to change into.
sentences.chinese: 翠平頭髮蓬亂，臉上有傷，卻被人給換了一身新衣服。

definition: half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
see 驚慌失措|惊慌失措[jing1 huang1 shi1 cuo4]
to like looking attractive (usually of girls)/aestheticism
